text: This plot to rob a French millionaire of 300,o00 worth of jewellery struck me as ingenious. The play had style, moved at a quick pace and everyone did well. But it was Mr. Houston's evening. Earlier, on the Palladium show I found Stanley Holloway's act too long and not particularly entertaining. It was also a mistake to re-book Gene Detroy and his performing chimpanzees so soon after their previous appearance.
handwritten_text: This plot to rob a French millionaire of 300,o00 worth of jewellery struck me as ingenious. The play had style, moved at a quick pace and everyone did well. But it was Mr. Houston's evening. Earlier, on the Palladium show I found Stanley Holloway's act too long and not particularly entertaining. It was also a mistake to re-book Gene Detroy and his performing chimpanzees so soon after their previous appearance.
